title: i want RP
body: Pls i want any RP in lol and i want yasuo and any skin yasuo

replies.body: We try to help when we can and if it's for a small amount.  How much RP were you looking for exactly?
enough for the emotes bundle pls rito i am broke

I can advice playing some tournaments earned +/- 10k rp with it already and got a nice triumphant ryze skin on top of it ^^
And its also nice to play in a tournament format with some friends so win win!
